rows.label: tev000491_MSG0001
rows.name: Is that you, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0002
rows.name: What brings you to this neck of the woods?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0003
rows.name:
As you can see, I've been inspecting the water-
purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0004
rows.name:
Water is every bit as vital here on Mira as it was back
on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0005
rows.name: Therefore, it must be rigorously supervised![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000491_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask H.B. if he is a Mediator.

rows.label: tev000491_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: tev000491_SEL0021
rows.name: Point out that this is a job for BLADE HQ.

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0006
rows.name: What idiocy is this? Have you lost your wits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0007
rows.name:
I am a Pathfinder through and through!
...And a quite famous one, I might add.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0008
rows.name: You are not wrong—the responsibility does lie with HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0009
rows.name:
"But wait!" I hear you cry. "Why is a Pathfinder of
H.B.'s stature doing their job for them?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0010
rows.name:
There are but two possibilities—because they are
incapable of doing it themselves, or because my
capabilities make me especially qualified.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0011
rows.name: The answer is, of course, the latter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, HQ is known to be shorthanded
at the moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0013
rows.name:
When capable citizens step up to assist with their
workload, it benefits all of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0014
rows.name:
Is hammering in data probes a Pathfinder's only duty
to New LA? No! The very notion reeks of indolence![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0015
rows.name:
If ever a citizen of New LA finds his talents needed,
he must answer the call, whenever and wherever it
comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0016
rows.name:
When fellow citizens are in peril, do you not rush to
their aid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_JNK0030
rows.name: Concur

rows.label: tev000491_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree that H.B.'s assertion is logically sound.

rows.label: tev000491_JNK0040
rows.name: Object

rows.label: tev000491_SEL0041
rows.name: Accept H.B.'s reasoning, but express reservations.

rows.label: tev000491_JNK0050
rows.name: Rebut

rows.label: tev000491_SEL0051
rows.name: Refute H.B.'s assertion.

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0017
rows.name:
I pride myself on being an excellent judge of character,
and I see now how right I was about your command
of objective reason and holistic wisdom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0018
rows.name:
I am honored to have met someone capable of
understanding my philosophy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0019
rows.name: That is an all-too-common reaction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0020
rows.name:
Nevertheless, I applaud your grasp of reason.
If you cannot embrace the truth, at least you can
accept it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0021
rows.name:
Even your minimal level of perspicacity is a breath
of fresh air by New LA standards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0022
rows.name: The nerve![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0023
rows.name: Do calm down now. You're embarrassing yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0024
rows.name:
Surely you didn't intend to pick a fight when you
initiated this conversation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0025
rows.name:
Please remember why you came here in the first place.
Oh, and do try to maintain your composure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0026
rows.name: Well, that concludes my inspection of this facility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0027
rows.name:
I have some important business to attend to in the
industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000491_MSG0028
rows.name: I hope we can work together again soon.[ST:wait ]
